title: YAPA ROUGH (50% OFF) - TipoType
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new release!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**"Yapa Rough"** by Vicente Lamónaca](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414192423/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/yapa-rough/?refby=tipotype), with a release offer of 50% OFF!!!

author: ferfolio_2

comments.content: Pretty nice typeface. It seems such a specific texture that it probably has a rather narrow application though. Still, for the intended application it's pretty cool. I would tighten the kerning in P\_A though.
